Digital Assets is a utility to follow cryptocurrencies prices, statistics and informations.
Features:
Price, volume, marketcap, rank
Circulating and max supply, ATH
Graphic of the day/month/year/all-time prices
Support of the most popular assets
Choose the base currency
Choose the assets list order method, make an asset favorite
Utility
Flatpak support
Use GSettings and GResource
Update to the Meson build system
Add a settings window and the possiblity to change the Nomics API key
Make the ATH percentage also work with the base currency
Currencies sort function improvements
Add the appdata file
Fix bugs
